pr_title: [Communication SDK for Android]: Bump up version number for communication-common and communication-chat

timeline.message: Bump up version number for communication-common and communication-chat

replies.bodyText: Common is an odd ball. We didn't release beta.2 but we do want next release to be consistent with the others, i.e. next should be beta.3 (Unreleased)
replies.author: JianpingChen

replies.bodyText: @vcolin7 JP is trying to sync this repo's version with the other languages.
replies.author: RezaJooyandeh

timeline.author: vcolin7
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 ext.publishName = "Microsoft Azure Android Client Library common code For Communication Service"
 description = "This package contains the Android client library common code for Microsoft Azure Communication Service."
-version = "1.0.0-beta.1"
+version = "1.0.0-beta.3"

replies.bodyText: beta.2 was the version we just published for communication in general. We want the current to be beta.3 (Unreleased). But Common is a special case where we didn't release beta.2. So the version has to jump to be consistent on next release.
replies.author: JianpingChen
